overview: Deepak is Partner with Bain Capital Ventures based in Boston, MA, where he is involved in sourcing, executing, and managing growth-stage investments in the digital media, Internet, ecommerce, and business services sectors. Prior to joining Bain Capital, Deepak was a senior investment professional with Comcast Interactive Capital, the venture capital firm affiliated with Comcast Corp where he made numerous direct investments in media and communications companies. Prior to joining CIC, Deepak worked as an independent consultant to several telecom startups, including M5 Networks, Purple Communications, and Sigma Networks. Prior to this role, Deepak held various product strategy and product management roles at Lucent Technologies. Before joining Lucent, he was co-founder of an Internet software company named ikimas, inc. Deepak began his career in investment banking at Credit Suisse First Boston Technology Group. He graduated from the Management & Technology Program at the University of Pennsylvania with a Bachelor of Science in Economics from The Wharton School and a Bachelor of Science in Electrical Engineering from the School of Engineering & Applied Science.
